own-your-domain-description: Your shop will have your own domain, logo and no ads
customer-care-description: Timmay.vn will directly support every reflection of the store 24/24
details-description: The store will display full information, addresses, contact numbers, maps, etc...

please-select-your-shop-package-to-conti: Please select your shop package to continue
